_sText:
Surf_Furios

This is my first skill surfmap i have ever made. There are -6 stages. -3Winner Jails. -1puplic jail if no one beats it. -2secret.
1.Winerjail A: You`ll get a m4 with a monster costume.
2.Winnerjail B: You`ll get a knife with a following laser and speedmod.
3.Winnerjail c: You`ll get an AWP with 910bullets
4.Publicjail: A racetrack with weapons and speedbooster.

Changes/Adds

 -Spotlights in Stage3 are blue now. -Fixed Portaljump-bug in Stage4. -Fixed Falldmg-bug. -Reworked stage 1. -Added a new "secret". -Fixed reflection-bug in Stage 5. -Changed textures on the Ramps in Stage 6. -Fixed all Jailbugs (hope so ^^). -Added Serenity Surf ip at spawn.

Beta Tester/Special thanks

 -Chuck Norris and all the baerchenland server players -Roxtar -Absolute -Mario -Luigi -Mushroom -Princess -Bowser -ChiChin -Absolute -WireleZz -Bl√°Ze -Planstik_2k -Ch1!!3r -Bob -kranksta -Synx -Geier -Copymark -Shoop -xyroNN. -ReVo

Have fun & Good Luck
Greetz Chefkoch
